sandy.core.Renderer

type
class
This class is design to handle the rendering processing of a Sandy3D scene. Basically, it collects elemens to render, prepare their matrix, project vertices. It also manage the cache system. It means it handle the fact that any non moving object isn't rendered. @author thomas @author Russell Weir - haXe port @version 3.1

Constructor

new()
Default renderer.

Instance Methods

addToDisplayList(p_oObject : sandy.core.scenegraph.IDisplayable) : Void

init() : Void

Init the renderer internal data

removeFromDisplayList(p_oObject : sandy.core.scenegraph.IDisplayable) : Void

render(p_oScene : Scene3D, ?p_bUseCache : Bool) : Bool

parameters:
p_bUseCache Bool value, default to true, use a cache system to aVoid unnecessary computation
Render the given scene. Objects are transformed, clipped and projected into that function.

renderDisplayList(p_oScene : Scene3D) : Void

parameters:
p_oScene The Scene3D object to render
Process the rendering of the scene. The camera has all the information needed about the objects to render. The camera stores all the visible shape/polygons into an array, and loop through it calling their display method. Before the display call, the container graphics is cleared.
